trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項型別。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Hyperlink" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Hyperlink" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Hyperlink".
trans-unit.target: 包含 "Hyperlink" 的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> 的文字標籤。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: 包含標籤的字串。

trans-unit.source: You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: 如同一般的使用者用來說明他們要參考控制項的文字字串，您可以將名稱屬性。

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您擁有中的所有控制項的文字表示[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]，您可以透過程式設計方式，以當地語系化的方式參考控制項。

trans-unit.source: A value in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉中的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke" />, this method returns a <see langword="this" /> pointer; otherwise, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke" />，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="this" /> 指標，否則會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive the user might understand the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer" /> 會由使用者辨識為互動式，或者使用者會將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink" /> 辨識為 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)] 中控制項的邏輯結構。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。
